R000.Body: You are ejected from a casket and fall on the floor. A metallic dark room surrounds you with other caskets lining the wall you fell from. The only thing in the room is a door marked H001.

H001.Body: The door opens to a hallway with three doors. The rooms R001 and R002 show unlocked but H002 is locked.

R001.Body: You see a storage room with multiple transparent storage cabinets, many with damaged chips of some sort. One storage is showing a glowing light.

Choices.Text: Try to open the glowing storage

R001_tryStorage.Body: You tug at the handle, but it won't budge. You need something thin and sharp to open it.

R002.Body: The room is full of mirrors on every wall, one glint catches your eye.

R002_afterMirror.Body: You stare into the mirror. You see a robotic figure with circular beady eyes staring back. Cold, mechanical, inhuman. A deep hum vibrates through your core.

Choices.Text: Break the mirror and take a shard

R002_afterBreak.Body: You shatter the mirror in fear and shock not being able to let out a scream. What are you? Who are you? Where are you. A shard reflects your face one last time. It fits your hand well, almost too well.

H002.Body: The hallway is locked. There is no way forward right now.
